snippet.title: PolyPine Official Gameplay Trailer - New Content Revealed!
snippet.description:
PolyPine is a cozy forest simulation game where you create habitats for plants, insects and animals, and click on animals to make them poop! Start with a few basic seeds and attempt to grow a thriving ecosystem.

I'm happy to announce that there is now a new Gameplay trailer for PolyPine which showcases a lot of new content!

The development of the game is progressing nicely. Here's an overview of things I've added recently:
- 42 animals and 35 plants are now in the game.
- Mountains that isolate populations of animals and plants.
- Campaign with 10 levels that take 4-10 hours to complete.
- Heavily expanded Freeplay mode with advanced terrain generation and lots of customization!
- Forest Fires, Storms, and Bark Beetle Swarms!
- Dead wood and fallen trunks with associated animals and plants.
- Create huge trees by sharing resources via mycorrhizal networks created by mushrooms.

Things are starting to come together and the feedback from a recent closed beta playtest session were very encouraging!
We are in the final stretch of finishing the game. I'm really eager to get this game out into the world :)

The full game is releasing early 2025. Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2718240/PolyPine
